explanation: [0-0] A man stands outdoors against the backdrop of vast fields and a sky filled with grayish-white clouds. He has black shoulder-length hair and a graying beard, wearing a brown wide-brimmed hat and tinted sunglasses, with a cigarette in his mouth. He is dressed in a brown-yellow vest and a green shirt with light green patterns, black pants, and a gun belt with a brown holster around his waist, holding neatly arranged bullets. In his right hand, he holds a black revolver.
[0-3] He lowers the revolver to the holster position on his right waist and fires four shots, with smoke billowing, then spins the gun on his right index finger.
